# titleText

**Instance Property**

The title of the digit entry view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var titleText: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The title is displayed along the top of the view.

## Configuring the Digit Entry View

- **numberOfDigits**: The number of required digits.
- **promptText**: A prompt that displays any additional required information.
- **isSecureDigitEntry**: A Boolean value that indicates whether an entered digit is immediately obscured.
